ANKLE ABCS.instruction: While in a seated position write the alphabet with your foot. Your ankle joint should be moving.

ANKLE CIRCLES.instruction: Move your ankle in a circular pattern, in one direction for several repetitions, then repeat in the opposite direction.

ANKLE PUMPS.instruction: Point your toes down and then pull your toes up repeatedly, moving your foot at the ankle joint.

BRIDGE.instruction: Lie on your back with knees bent. Squeeze your buttocks and raise your hip into the air.

CAT COW.instruction: Start in a quadruped stance with your hands and knees on the floor. Slowly arch your back and lift your head. Then slowly round your back towards the celing and bring your head towards your chest.

CERVICAL EXTENSION.instruction: Tilt your head upwards and then return to starting position.

CERVICAL FLEXION.instruction: Tilt your head foward and then return to starting position.

CERVICAL RETRATION.instruction: While standing straight, bring your neck back until your ears line up with your shoulders.

CERVICAL ROTATION.instruction: While keeping your chin up in a neutral position, turn your head side to side.

CERVICAL SIDE BEND.instruction: While looking forward the entire time, bring your head to the side, then to the other side.

CHILDS POSE.instruction: In a kneeling position with outstretched arms, sit back on heels until a stretch is felt.

DEAD BUGS.instruction: Lie on your back with your arms pointing towards the ceiling and your hips and knees bent. Slowly straighten out one of your legs while bringing the opposite arm overhead. Return to starting position before repeating on the other side.

DOORWAY PEC STRETCH.instruction: Standing in a doorway and place your arms up on the door jam. Place one foot through the doorway and slightly lunge forward until you feel a stretch.

DOUBLE KNEE TO CHEST STRETCH.instruction: Lying on your back. Hug both knees toward your chest until you feel a stretch.

ELASTIC BAND: DORSIFLEXION.instruction: While seated, have an elastic band attached to your foot, pull your foot upward against the elastic band.

ELASTIC BAND: EVERSION.instruction: Using an elastic band attached to your foot, hook it under your opposite foot and up to your hand. Move your foot outwards against the elastic band.

ELASTIC BAND: EXTENSION.instruction: Hold the band with both hands and keep your elbows straight. Pull the band straight down to your side.

ELASTIC BAND: EXTERNAL ROTATION.instruction: Hold an elastic band with the affected arm with your palm up. Keeping your elbow in your side pull the band to the side.

ELASTIC BAND: INTERNAL ROTATION.instruction: Hold an elastic band with the affected arm with palms up. While keeping your elbow to your side, bring the band inward.

ELASTIC BAND: INVERSION.instruction: While seated, cross your legs and using the elastic band attached to your foot, hook it under your opposite foot and up to your hand. Move your foot inward against the elastic band.

ELASTIC BAND: PLANTARFLEXION.instruction: While seated, use an elastic band attached to your foot and press your foot downward and forward.

ELASTIC BAND: ROWS.instruction: Hold the elastic band with both hands the pull the band back while keeping your elbows bent.

ELBOW FLEXION EXTENSION.instruction: Standing up, bend and straighen your elbow repeatedly.

FINGER TAPS.instruction: Using your thumb, alternate touching the tips of your thumb and your fingers. Thumb to pointer, thumb to middle, etc.

HEEL SLIDES.instruction: While laying on a table, slide your affected heel towards your butt. Return to the starting position.

ISOMETRIC SHOULDER EXTENSION.instruction: Stand with your shoulder bent and the back of your elbow against a wall. Push the back of your elbow straight into the wall.

ISOMETRIC SHOULDER EXTERNAL ROTATION.instruction: Stand with your elbow bent and hand placed against a wall. Slowly push your hand into the wall.

ISOMETRIC SHOULDER FLEXION.instruction: Stand with your elbow bent and fist against the wall. Push your first directly into the wall.

KNEELING HIP FLEXOR STETCH.instruction: Kneeling on the floor with the unaffected leg in front. Keeping your chest up, slowly shift your weight forward until you feel a stretch and hold.

LEVATOR SCAP STRETCH.instruction: With the arm of the affect side behind your back, bring your head towards the opposite side armpit and hold.

LONG ARC QUADS.instruction: While seated with knees bent, straighten your knee and point your toes up.

LOWER TRUNK ROTATIONS.instruction: Lie on your back with your knees bent. Slowly bring both knees to one side. Go back to the starting position and repeat on the other side.

MARBLE PICK-UP.instruction: With marbles laid out on a towel. Pick up a marble one at a time and place it into your hand. Once your hand is full place them back on the towel.

OVERHEAD PULLEY FLEXION.instruction: Slowly pull down with your unaffected arm to raise your affect arm up. Your uaffected arm should be doing all of the work.

PELVIC TILT.instruction: While lying on your back with knees bent, arch and flatten your back repeatedly.

PIRIFORMIS STRETCH - SITTING.instruction: Sit in a chair with chest up and affected leg crossed over the other. Keeping your back straight, hinge your hips to feel a stretch and hold.

PIRIFORMIS STRETCH - SUPINE.instruction: Lying on your back with your knees bent, cross your affected leg over the other form a figure four shape. Grab under your unaffected knee and pull it to your chest. Hold for a stretch and release.

PRAYER STRETCH.instruction: Place your wrists together in front of your chest and hold.

PRONE EXTENSION.instruction: Lie on your stomach with your arm off the side of the table. Keeping your elbow straight, raise your arm towards your side.

PRONE HIP EXTENSION.instruction: Lay on your stomach. Keep your knee straight and lift your leg off of the table.

PRONE HORIZONTAL ABDUCTION.instruction: Lie on your stomach with your arm hanging off the table. While keeping your elbow straight, raise your arm straight to the side.

PRONE ON ELBOWS.instruction: Lying face down, slowly prop yourself up with your elbows. Hold and lower youself back down.

PUTTY SQUEEZE.instruction: Holding putty in the palm of your hand, squeeze slowly and tightly. Reshape and repeat.

QUAD SETS.instruction: Tighten your quad and try to press the back of your knee towards the table.

QUADRICEP STRETCH STANDING.instruction: Using a stationary object for support, bend your knee behind you. Grab your ankle and hold.

QUADRUPED THORACIC STRETCH.instruction: Start in a quadruped stance with your hands and knees on the floor. Place one arm behind your head and rotate your back until you feel a stretch.

SCAPULAR SQUEEZES.instruction: Draw your shoulder blades back to get a good squeeze on your scapulae.

SEATED MARCHING.instruction: While seating, raise your knee straight up into the air. Repeat with the other leg.

SERRATUS PUNCHES.instruction: Lie on your back with your arm extended towards the ceiling. Keep your elbow straight and protract your shoulder forward towards the ceiling.

SHORT ARC QUAD.instruction: Place a rolled up towel under your knee and straighten your leg.

SHOULDER BALL CIRCLES ON WALL.instruction: With your shoulder at 90 degrees, place a ball between your hand the wall. Slowly roll the ball in a circular motion

SHOULDER INTERNAL ROTATION WITH TOWEL.instruction: In standing position with a towel behind your back, bring your unaffected arm toward the ceiling until you feel a stretch.

SHOULDER PENDULUMS.instruction: While using a stable object for support, tilt your upper body towards a 90 degree angle. Use your body to shift your weight in a circular motion. Your arm should be fully relaxed, with your body creating the momentum for your shoulder to swing.

SHOULDER ROLLS.instruction: While sitting straight, move your shoulders in a circular pattern going up, back, and down.

SHOULDER WAND ABDUCTION.instruction: While holding a wand palm up on the affected side and palm down on the other side, slowly raise up your injured arm to the side.

SHOULDER WAND EXTENSION.instruction: Stand straight with a wand behind your back. Extend your shoulders and bring the wand away from your back.

SHOULDER WAND EXTERNAL ROTATION.instruction: Lie on a table holding a wand with your elbows bent. Use your unaffected arm to push the wand towards your affected arm. Keep the affected arm's elbow tucked in your side.

SIDELYING CLAMSHELLS.instruction: Lie on your side with your hip and knees bent. Raise your top knee up while keeping both feet in contact with another.

SIDELYING EXTERNAL ROTATION.instruction: Lie on your side with your elbow bent tucked into your side. While keeping your elbow bent, move your arm towards the ceiling.

SIDELYING HIP ABDUCTION.instruction: Lay on your side. Keeping your knee straight, raise your top leg to the side in-line with your body.

SIDELYING HIP ADDUCTION.instruction: Lay on your side and cross your top leg over the bottom. While keeping the bottom knee straight, lift your leg into the air, in-line with your body.

SIDELYING THORACIC STRETCH.instruction: Lie on your side with your knees bent and both hands straight out in front of you. Slowly rotate and bring your top arm back until you feel a stretch.

SINGLE KNEE TO CHEST STRETCH.instruction: Lying on your back, bring one knee toward your chest until you feel a stretch.

SINGLE LEG STANCE.instruction: Stand on one leg and maintain your balance.

SLEEPER STRETCH.instruction: Start by lying on your side with the affected arm on the bottom. Use your unaffected arm to gently bring your affected forearm towards the table.

SQUATS.instruction: Stand with your legs shoulder-width apart. Bend your hips and knees as if sitting back into a seat then return to the starting position. Keep your weight on your heels and do not let your knees go in front of your toes.

STANDING CALF STRETCH.instruction: Stand in front of a wall. Step forward with one foot and keep your toes on both feet pointing forward. To stretch the gastrocnemius keep the back leg straight during the stretch. To stretch the soleus, bend the back leg slightly.

STANDING HEEL RAISE.instruction: While standing, raise up onto your toes and lift your heels up off the ground.

STANDING HIP ABDUCTION.instruction: While standing and knees kept straight, bring your leg out to your side.

STANDING HIP EXTENSION.instruction: While stranding with knees straight, bring your leg straight back. Make sure to keep your chest up and not lean forward.

STANDING MARCHES.instruction: While standing, lift your knee straight up into air. Repeat with the other leg.

STRAIGHT LEG RAISES.instruction: While lying on your back, keep the affected knee straight and the unaffected knee bent. Raise the affected leg straight up.

SUPINE CHIN TUCK.instruction: Laying flat on a table, bring your chin to your chest. Keep the back of your head on the table at all times.

SUPINE HAMSTRING STRETCH.instruction: Lie on your back with a towel or belt around your foot. Keeping your knee straight, slowly bring your foot towards your head until you feel a stretch.

SUPINE HIP ABDUCTION.instruction: Lie on your back with knees bent, and place an elastic band around your knees. Keeping your feet on the ground, bring your knees outward.

SUPINE HIP ADDUCTION.instruction: Lie on your back with knees bent. Place a rolled up towel or ball between your legs. Squeeze the object between your knees.

SUPINE SHOULDER WAND FLEXION.instruction: Lying on your back with a wand at your hips. Slowly raise the wand towards the top of your head.

SWISS BALL HAMSTRING CURL.instruction: Lie on your back with your feet on the swiss ball. Slowly bring your knees toward your chest, bringing the ball with you. Return to starting position and repeat.

SWISS BALL SQUATS.instruction: Stand with the swiss ball between your back and a wall. Slowly squat down and return to the starting position.

TOE TOWEL CRUNCH.instruction: With your foot on top of a towel. Curl your toes to try to scrunch the towel. Relax and repeat.

TOWEL SCRUNCH.instruction: Place a towel on a table in front of you. Flex your fingers and pull the towel towards you.

UPPER TRAP STRETCH.instruction: With one hand behind your back, slowly bring your head towards the other shoulder and hold.

WAND FLEXION.instruction: Lie on your back holding a wand or cane. Using your unaffected arm to assist, raise the wand overhead.

WAND PRONATION SUPINATION.instruction: Using a long object like a hammer and your wrist on a table, rotation your forearm back and forth.

WRIST CURL - EXTENSION.instruction: Rest your forearm on a table with a small free-weight in your hand. With your palm face down, bend your wirst up and down.

WRIST CURL - FLEXION.instruction: Rest your forearm on a table with a free-weight in your hand. With your palm facing up, bend your wrist up and down.

WRIST EXTENSOR STRETCH.instruction: Keep your elbow straight and use your unaffected hand to bend your affected wrist down.

WRIST FLEXOR STRETCH.instruction: Keep your elbow straight and use your unaffected hand to bend your affected wrist upwards.

WRIST TENDON GLIDES.instruction: Start with an open palm and bend your fingers to a claw hand. Return to an open palm and then to an "L" hand". Return to an open palm and then make a fist. Repeat the series.
